item.rel_title: Healthcare-resource-adjusted vulnerabilities towards the 2019-nCoV epidemic across China
item.rel_abs: We integrate the human movement and healthcare resource data to identify cities with high vulnerability towards the 2019-nCoV epidemic with respect to available health resources. The results inform public health responses in multiple ways.
item.rel_authors: Zhou, H.; Yang, J.; Tang, K.; Zhang, Q.; cao, z.; Pfeiffer, D.; Zeng, D. D.
